Title: Prohibits the erection or maintenance of billboards advertising alcoholic beverages within 1000 feet of schools and playgrounds
Summary: Prohibits the erection or maintenance of billboards advertising alcoholic beverages within 1000 feet of schools and playgrounds; defines billboards.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to billboards advertising alcoholic beverages
